SELECT 'CR' || trim(nvl(max(to_char(to_number(substr(comrno,3))+1,'000000')),'000001')) as comrno from replycommu
union
select nvl(null,'CR000001') as comrno from dual where not exists (select comrno from replycommu)
select a.comrno as rno ,a.replyText ,a.regDate ,a.updateDate ,a.cpostno as refNo ,a.eno ,b.name ,b.photo from replycommu a, employee b where a.eno = b.eno and cpostno=#{refNo} order by comrno asc
select count(comrno) from replycommu where cpostno=#{refNo}
